vocabularyquestions.question: Fill in the blank: I ______ down for an hour every afternoon.
Choose the correct statement:
vocabularyquestions.answer1: A) Please turn on the light.
vocabularyquestions.answer4: D) Please shut down the light.
vocabularyquestions.correct: A) Please turn on the light.

vocabularyquestions.question: Choose the correct statement:
vocabularyquestions.answer1: A) I had a strange dream last night.
vocabularyquestions.answer2: B) I got a strange dream last night.
vocabularyquestions.answer3: C) I saw a strange dream last night.
vocabularyquestions.answer4: D) I faced a strange dream last night.
vocabularyquestions.correct: A) I had a strange dream last night.

vocabularyquestions.question: Choose the correct statement:
vocabularyquestions.answer1: A) He tore the letter in anger.
vocabularyquestions.answer2: B) He teared up the letter in anger.
vocabularyquestions.answer3: C) He tore up the letter in anger.
vocabularyquestions.answer4: D) He teared the letter in anger.
vocabularyquestions.correct: C) He tore up the letter in anger.

vocabularyquestions.question: When a word ends with "y", and the letter before "y" is a consonant; for the various other forms of the word, "y" is replaced with:
Choose the correct statement:
vocabularyquestions.answer1: A) It is dirty, give it away.
vocabularyquestions.answer2: B) It is dirty, throw it.
vocabularyquestions.answer3: C) It is dirty, throw it away.
vocabularyquestions.answer4: D) It is dirty, give it.
vocabularyquestions.correct: C) It is dirty, throw it away.

vocabularyquestions.question: Which of these words is correct?
Choose the correct statement:
vocabularyquestions.answer1: A) I should take more exercise.
vocabularyquestions.answer2: B) I should have more exercise.
vocabularyquestions.answer3: C) I should make more exercise.
vocabularyquestions.answer4: D) I should give more exercise.
vocabularyquestions.correct: A) I should take more exercise.

vocabularyquestions.question: Fill in the blank: My watch is five minutes ______.
Fill in the blank: The thief has ______ all my belongings.
